Welcome to my corner of the internet. My name is Keiland Cooper and in a nutshell, I plan to make the short time we currently have improve for as many people as possible; whether by research, technology, philosophy, or policy- if I have to leave this world, it's going to be a better place than when I arrived.

I'm studying Cognitive Science, Neuroscience, and Computer Science, while conducting research with a team of amazing people who aim to characterize the functional circuit-level processes of memory.
